headline: Ameriprise Financial Earns Five Awards for Excellence in Learning and Development from Brandon Hall Group
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, November 07, 2024--Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) today announced the firm won five awards for excellence in learning and development from research and analyst firm Brandon Hall Group. Ameriprise received four gold and one bronze award in the category of Human Capital Management Excellence. Brandon Hall issues the awards in recognition of firms that have implemented innovative and effective training and development programs. Entries for the awards are evaluated and ranked by
